body:
Have Spack Pad RPATHs so they can be later relocated via chrpath.  Thoughts:
1. Spack will need some formula of how long to make the padded RPATH, based on how many items are in it.
2. The user should be able to configure this.

See general discussion at:
https://github.com/LLNL/spack/issues/640
title: Generally Relocatable Packages via chrpath
